title: Walking with Mommy: To the Pond
description: "To the Pond" is the first in a four part series called "Walking with Mommy" about going on adventures with your mommy. In To the Pond, the mommy and daughter leave their home and encounter many curious creatures, talk about new and exciting subjects, and discover a whole new world. Taking a walk with your child is one of the most magical bonding experiences you will have. There are no distractions, just the two of you in rhythm together and left to discover the world outside. This book is meant to encourage both parent and child to get outdoors and get exploring the world around them! It is full of funny alliteration and sweet moments. Grab a copy today for you and your little ones to enjoy reading together!WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING ABOUT WALKING WITH TO THE "Walking with To the Pond is a delightfully whimsical book that acts as a magnifying glass for seemingly mundane everydayness. It subtly asks us to find the small novelties and experience awe in the objects and events that tend to go unnoticed. The story encourages us to look through the eyes of our children to find that everything is exciting and important. The playfully colorful illustrations catch the eyes of both the parent and the child reader while blending seamlessly with this fun and heartwarming narrative."
author: Kaitlyn Roberts
